entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 7. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow becoming mixed with periods of ice pellets overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers late in the morning and in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 6. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023
